scripts.init: npx pnpm run bootstrap && npx cross-env INIT=true node scripts/init
scripts.clean: npx pnpm -r exec -- rm -rf node_modules && npx pnpm -r exec -- rm -rf .serverless
scripts.build: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-* exec -- sls package
scripts.build:api: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-api-* exec -- sls package
scripts.build:resources: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-resources-* exec -- sls package
scripts.build:resources:api: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-resources-api exec -- sls package
scripts.build:web: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-web exec -- npx pnpm run build
scripts.deploy: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-* exec -- sls deploy
scripts.deploy:fresh: npx pnpm run clean && npx pnpm run bootstrap && npx pnpm run deploy
scripts.deploy:api: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-api-* exec -- sls deploy
scripts.deploy:resources: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-resources-* exec -- sls deploy
scripts.deploy:resources:api: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-resources-api exec -- sls deploy
scripts.deploy:web: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-web exec -- sls deploy
scripts.remove: npx pnpm run remove:api && npx pnpm run remove:resources && npx pnpm run remove:web
scripts.remove:api: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-api-* exec -- sls remove
scripts.remove:resources:api: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-resources-api exec -- sls remove
scripts.remove:resources: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-resources-* exec -- sls remove
scripts.remove:web: npx pnpm -r --filter sls-web exec -- sls remove
scripts.docker:deploy: docker run --rm juquinha:latest npx pnpm run deploy
